#215

- Growing gregariously down Black Oak log in open mixed oak/hickory woodland.
- Cap tough, spongy, saturated by recent rains, consisting of matted down tufts of hair. Orange colors closer to base.
- Hymenium adorned with layers of crowded teeth.

Smell: fruity
KOH: Reddish on top of cap.
